about_cards.title: Eco-friendly travel
about_cards.text: GreenEscape invites you to travel differently: more local, gentler, and truly sustainable.

about_cards.title: 100% car-free
about_cards.text: The app guides you through car-free itineraries, eco-friendly stays and food spots, live weather, and an AI travel planner.

about_cards.title: Forum & offline PDF
about_cards.text: Enjoy a supportive travel forum and downloadable PDF to plan your trip even without a network.

about_cards.title: Eco-designed app
about_cards.text: Lightweight, fast, and green-hosted ‚Äî this app is built to reduce its environmental footprint.

about_cards.title: Less emissions, more emotions
about_cards.text: Travel better, slower, simpler ‚Äî and above all, more sustainably.

about_cards.title: 100% free
about_cards.text: The app is free, ad-free, and made with love. One sign-up gives you full access.

about_donation_message:
